Developer Terms of Use
des:
We know how much Alexa makes life easier for us, thanks to voice commands.
Putting aside the tedious tasks; like going to a switch to turn off just one light, allowing us to focus more time on our professional and personal activities.

That's why we created an interface (skill) that allows you to communicate with your lights, contact sensors and temperature sensors through the MikroDash broker.

Requirements
 1. Create an account on MikroDash.
 2. Configure at least one device (Contact Sensor, Temperature Sensor, Light) in the MikroDash Platform.

If you don't have an account:
 1. Search for MikroDash in your preferred web browser.
 2. Go to the video section and follow the steps to create and set up your account for free.

The steps are very simple

Link MikroDash account and search for devices
 1. Find the MikroDash skill on the device you want to install it on.
 2. Select the MikroDash skill and press the "Activate" button.
 3. Next, a window will open which will request you to log in to MikroDash to link the account; Enter your information and press the "Conectar con Alexa" button.
 4. A new screen will appear where the data that will be shared from the MikroDash platform to the MikroDash skill will appear, if you agree, press the "Permitir" button.
 5. If the search for devices button appears, tap it, otherwise say "Alexa, search for devices."
 6. Done, at the end of the device search, it will show you a list of the smart devices that were found in your local network and in your MikroDash account.

Finally, we show you some examples to control-monitor your home devices.
“Alexa, turn off the living room light”
"Alexa, is the door open?"
"Alexa, what is the temperature in the greenhouse?"

Also, we recommend using the "Routines" feature to automatically turn your lights off and on every day at a certain time.

Thank you very much, your comments are very helpful.
